title: Chestcommands为什么玩家打不开
author: mm199992
txt_content: Chestcommands 只有op能打开主菜单 普通玩家却不可以 求助！！！

replies.author: Innovators
replies.txt_content:
权限问题
菜单权限为
chestcommands.open.filename.yml
chestcommands.item.filename.yml复制代码
假设菜单名为CaiDan.yml,则应该给的权限是
chestcommands.open.CaiDan.yml
chestcommands.item.CaiDan.yml
